verses.text: \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w eighth|strong="H8066"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w*, \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* ancients \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* said \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*:

\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w herd|strong="H1241"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w calf|strong="H5695"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* holocaust, both \w without|strong="H8549"\w* \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* ye \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w he|strong="H8141"\w* \w goat|strong="H5795"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w calf|strong="H5695"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w*, both \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w without|strong="H8549"\w* \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* holocaust,

\w Also|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* bullock \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w peace|strong="H8002"\w* \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* immolate \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w every|strong="H3117"\w* \w one|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* flour tempered \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w appear|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w They|strong="H0834"\w* \w brought|strong="H7126"\w* \w therefore|strong="H4872"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* door \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w*: \w where|strong="H0834"\w* \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* multitude \w stood|strong="H5975"\w*,

\w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*: \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w appear|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*: \w Approach|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* sacrifice \w for|strong="H1157"\w* thy \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*: \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* holocaust, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* pray \w for|strong="H1157"\w* thyself \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H1157"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H0834"\w* thou hast slain \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w peopleâ€™s|strong="H5971"\w* victim, pray \w for|strong="H1157"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4196"\w* forthwith \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w approaching|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, immolated \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w calf|strong="H5695"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*:

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w brought|strong="H7126"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w dipped|strong="H2881"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w finger|strong="H0676"\w* therein, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w touched|strong="H2881"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w poured|strong="H3332"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* rest \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* foot thereof.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w fat|strong="H2459"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* little \w kidneys|strong="H3629"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* caul \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w liver|strong="H3516"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w for|strong="H4196"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w burnt|strong="H6999"\w* upon \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*:

\w But|strong="H1320"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w and|strong="H0784"\w* \w skins|strong="H5785"\w* thereof \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w* \w with|strong="H8313"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* without \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*.

\w He|strong="H0853"\w* immolated \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w victim|strong="H4672"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* holocaust: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* brought \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* thereof, which \w he|strong="H0853"\w* poured \w round|strong="H5439"\w* \w about|strong="H5439"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w victim|strong="H4672"\w* being cut \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w pieces|strong="H5409"\w*, \w they|strong="H5921"\w* brought \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w and|strong="H7218"\w* all \w the|strong="H0853"\w* members, all which \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* fire \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*,
Having first \w washed|strong="H7364"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w entrails|strong="H7130"\w* \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* feet \w with|strong="H5921"\w* water.

\w Then|strong="H3947"\w* \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* \w for|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* \w of|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w slew|strong="H7819"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w goat|strong="H8163"\w*: \w and|strong="H0853"\w* expiating \w the|strong="H0853"\w* altar,
\w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w offered|strong="H7126"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* holocaust:

Adding \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H4503"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* libations, which \w are|strong="H3709"\w* \w offered|strong="H6999"\w* withal, \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w burning|strong="H6999"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, \w besides|strong="H0905"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* ceremonies \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* holocaust.

\w He|strong="H0834"\w* immolated \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* bullock \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w peace|strong="H8002"\w* \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* brought \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* poured \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w round|strong="H5439"\w* \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* bullock, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* rump \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w two|strong="H4480"\w* little \w kidneys|strong="H3629"\w*, \w with|strong="H4480"\w* \w their|strong="H4480"\w* \w fat|strong="H2459"\w*, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* caul \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w liver|strong="H3516"\w*,

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w breasts|strong="H2373"\w*. \w And|strong="H4196"\w* \w after|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* \w was|strong="H2459"\w* \w burnt|strong="H6999"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*,

\w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* separated \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w breasts|strong="H2373"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* shoulders, elevating \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* stretching \w forth|strong="H5375"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*. \w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* victims \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* holocausts, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w peace|strong="H8002"\w* \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w* being finished, \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w came|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* testimony, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* afterwards \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* multitude:

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, \w coming|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w devoured|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* holocaust, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*: \w which|strong="H0784"\w* \w when|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* multitude \w saw|strong="H7200"\w*, \w they|strong="H5921"\w* praised \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w falling|strong="H5307"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w faces|strong="H6440"\w*.
